name: Cheezburger
description: Cheezburger, an innovative meme coin on the Base network. CHZ combines entertainment with intelligent tokenomics and aims to be a model for community - driven cryptocurrencies. Trough the Cheezburger Factory, we aim to enable easy one-click deployment of the same innovative tokenomics that power CHZ. By using highly optimized Solidity code CHZ shows memecoins can make technical contributions beyond speculation.
